description: Enterprise techniques used by PLAINTEE, ATT&CK software S0254 (v1.1)
name: PLAINTEE (S0254)

techniques.comment: An older variant of [PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) performs UAC bypass.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)

[PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) gains persistence by adding the Registry key HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) uses cmd.exe to execute commands on the victim’s machine.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) encodes C2 beacons using XOR.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) has downloaded and executed additional plugins.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) uses reg add to add a Registry Run key for persistence.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) performs the tasklist command to list running processes.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) collects general system enumeration data about the infected machine and checks the OS version.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
[PLAINTEE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0254) uses the ipconfig /all command to gather the victim’s IP address.(Citation: Rancor Unit42 June 2018)
